mdRecord.dcterms:description: Side view of tower from grassy area

The Church of the Sacred Heart of Jesus (Kostel Nejsvětějšího srdce Páně in Czech) is the most important church building of the 20th century in the Czech lands. It is located in the district Vinohrady on náměstí Jiřího z Poděbrad (King George of Poděbrady Square) close to Jiřího z Poděbrad metro station. http://www.prague-wiki.com/wiki/Church_of_the_Sacred_Heart_of_Jesus [work]
